categories.name: technical_skills
questions: What programming languages are you most comfortable with?
How would you rate your proficiency in PHP, Java, Python, and JavaScript?
Describe your experience with SQL and database design.
Which web frameworks have you used and in what context?
Do you have experience with version control and Git workflows?

categories.name: leadership_collaboration
questions: Tell me about a team project you worked on and your role.
How do you handle disagreements or conflicts in a team?
Give an example of how you mentored or helped a teammate.
Describe your collaboration with non-technical stakeholders.

categories.name: problem_solving
questions: Describe a challenging technical problem you solved.
How do you approach debugging complex issues?
What steps do you take to ensure code quality and reliability?

categories.name: career_progression
questions: How have you grown professionally over the past year?
What are your short-term and long-term career goals?
What skills are you currently working to improve?

categories.name: industry_knowledge
questions: What is your understanding of cybersecurity practices you've studied?
How do you stay current with trends in software development?

categories.name: cultural_fit
questions: How would you describe your working style and values?
What environment do you perform best in?

categories.name: achievement_quantification
questions: What measurable impact did your Library Management System project have?
Share a time when you improved performance or efficiency with metrics.
What are your biggest achievements so far and how do you quantify them?

categories.name: profile_facts
questions: What is your full name?
How old are you?
Where are you currently based and what is your work authorization status?
